data.title: “Play By The Rules” Is A Hit!

summary.content: After getting back from my vacation last night, and checking my referrers, I’ve found that my article “Play By The Rules” has been a moderate success! Besides having a metric ton of hits from Google, apparently Henrik Gemal posted a link to my article on his website… which is very good. Paland.tv, Phaedo.cx, and Deluks Pixelworks all made weblog posts about it. EdgeWalker made a forum post about it, and “deLUKs” added it to his forum signature. I even got very positive feedback from Jeffrey Zeldman, Dave Shea, and Henrik Gemal.

content.plain:
After getting back from my vacation last night, and checking my referrers, I’ve found that my article “Play By The Rules” has been a moderate success!
Besides having a metric ton of hits from Google, apparently Henrik Gemal posted a link to my article on his website… which is very good. content.source:
After getting back from my vacation last night, and checking my [referrers](../refer/), I’ve found that my article [“Play By The Rules”](../articles/playbytherules.htm) has been a moderate success!

Besides having a metric ton of hits from [Google]({{% wayback "http://www.google.com" %}}), apparently [Henrik Gemal]({{% wayback "http://www.gemal.dk" %}}) posted a [link to my article]({{% wayback "http://gemal.dk/archives/000230.html" %}}) on his website… which is *very* good. [Paland.tv]({{% wayback "http://paland.tv/blog/eintrag-154.htm" %}}), [Phaedo.cx]({{% wayback "http://phaedo.cx/archives/2003/07/30/jesus_people_play_by_the_rules.html" %}}), and [Deluks Pixelworks]({{% wayback "http://www.deluks.de/v3/?nav=links" %}}) all made weblog posts about it. [EdgeWalker made a forum post]({{% wayback "http://forum.ingame.de/quake/showthread.php3?threadid=117105" %}}) about it, and “deLUKs” added it to his [forum signature]({{% wayback "http://forum.ingame.de/quake/showthread.php3?postid=1937865" %}}). I even got very positive feedback from [Jeffrey Zeldman]({{% wayback "http://www.zeldman.com" %}}), [Dave Shea]({{% wayback "http://www.mezzoblue.com" %}}), and [Henrik Gemal]({{% wayback "http://www.gemal.dk" %}}).
